case.title: Seeking GOOD woman NSA FWB chill 420 - 26 (Near to BK bridge)
case.text:
Hi there Thanks for your reading. My personality is easygoing,friendry and so chilling.
My work is buyer.I buy vintage clothing and antiques for mycountry. I love fashion,art,and any kind of music.of course Rock,post rock,indierock,electro,jazz fusion,hip hop,chill out music.and I love 420.I have good one an good bong.
I'm looking for friends for chill out with.I open to anyrace and anyage. I'm short hair now. If you interested me let me know! Lets hangout or chill out!
